attributes.action: make it illegal for MPs and News Agencies to manipulate information in a manner that deceives the public in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All information must be presented as close to the understood reality from facts of the situation as can be obtained at the time.

The main purpose of this law is to stop manipulation of the masses through News Media in the UK, and to stop Politicians from blurring the lines between what they say they will do, and their capability.

No political body can publish a manifesto without saying how they can fulfil on promises, and not without the methods being realistic (non manipulative).

This law is to stop manipulation by the media which blurs the reality of a situation and puts things heavily out of context, which misconstrues reality for many people.

This law it to allow the people to make clear choices in which political parties they elect in the UK, without having to do heavy research through the smoke & mirrors, and manipulation of data.
